headline.main: WORK OF AMATEUR COOKS; They Prepared a "Course" Luncheon for Their Guests at School No. 9. DOMESTIC SCIENCE HELPFUL Miss Pond Says There Is No Branch of Study Which Is Not Made Practicable in the Kitchen -- Girls Learn to Eat Hygienically.
